sentences.en: 43 As we sow, so shall we reap.
As a man sows, so he shall reap.
sentences.cn: 种瓜得瓜, 种豆得豆.

sentences.en: critics believe we are now reaping the harvest of our permissive ways.
sentences.cn: 批评家们相信我们正在遭受因采取宽容放任的方法所带来的后果。

sentences.en: Cultivating a positive mental attitude towards yourself can reap tremendous benefits.
sentences.cn: 培养一种自信的积极心态会让人受益匪浅。

sentences.en: He had certainly feltthat he should reap some sort of a harvest.
sentences.cn: 他已经预感到会有些油水可捞.

sentences.en: In doing so, you but sow the wind to reap the whirlwind.
sentences.cn: 这样做, 你只能得到更坏的结果.

sentences.en: It is not easy to reap the harvest of my hard work.
sentences.cn: 获得自己辛勤工作的成果是不容易的.

sentences.en: It'serves you right. As a man sows, so does he reap.
sentences.cn: 你是罪有应得, 种瓜得瓜, 种豆得豆嘛!
善意的行动得到幸福的微笑.

sentences.en: Our firm is likely to reap a big profit this year.
sentences.cn: 今年我们公司很可能获得巨额利润.

sentences.en: The company is only just starting to reap the rewards of long-term investments.
sentences.cn: 这家公司才刚刚开始收获长期投资的回报。

sentences.en: The modest receive benefit, while the conceited reap failure.
The peasants leaned down to reap wheat.
They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.
sentences.cn: 流泪撒种的必欢呼收割.

sentences.en: We are not in this to reap immense financial rewards.
sentences.cn: 我们从事这一行不是为了获得巨大的经济回报。

sentences.en: You must reap what you have sown.
You'll soon begin to reap the benefits of being fitter.
sentences.cn: 你很快就会体会到身体更健康带来的好处。

trans.tran_en: to cut and collect a crop of grain

trans.tran_cn: 收割， 收获； 获得， 得到
trans.tran_en: to get something, especially something good, as a result of what you have done
to cut and collect a crop of grain
